00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.GUI;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.DownloadManager {
00034     public class FileProgressObject : Gtk.HBox {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00038         public event BlankEventHandler Delete = null;
00039 
00040         // ============================================
00041         // PROTECTED Members
00042         // ============================================
00043         protected Gtk.ProgressBar progressBar;
00044         protected Gtk.Button deleteButton;
00045         protected Gtk.Label labelStatus;
00046         protected Gtk.Image imageLogo;
00047         protected Gtk.Label labelName;
00048 
00049         // ============================================
00050         // PRIVATE Members
00051         // ============================================
00052         private DateTime startTime;
00053         private Gtk.VBox vbox;
00054         private bool finished;
00055 
00056         internal bool timeoutRet = true;
00057         internal uint timeout;
00058 
00059         // ============================================
00060         // PUBLIC Constructors
00061         // ============================================ 
00062         public FileProgressObject() : base(false, 2) {
00063             startTime = DateTime.Now;
00064             InitializeObject();
00065             finished = false;
00066     
00067             timeoutRet = true;
00068             timeout = GLib.Timeout.Add(1000, UpdateDownloadTime);
00069             UpdateDownloadTime();
00070         }
00071 
00072         ~FileProgressObject() {
00073             timeoutRet = false;
00074         }
00075 
00076         // ============================================
00077         // PUBLIC Methods
00078         // ============================================
00079         public void SetName (string fileName, string userName) {
00080             FileName = "<b>" + fileName + "</b> (" + userName + ")";
00081         }
00082 
00083         public void SetTransferInfo (long current, long total, int percent) {
00084             string currentStr = FileUtils.GetSizeString(current);
00085             string totalStr = FileUtils.GetSizeString(total);
00086             string percentStr = percent.ToString() + "%";
00087             Info = currentStr + " of " + totalStr + " (" +  percentStr + ")  ";
00088 
00089             int sec = (DateTime.Now - startTime).Seconds;
00090             if (sec > 0) {
00091                 Info += FileUtils.GetSizeString(current / sec) + "/s";
00092             }
00093 
00094             this.progressBar.Fraction = (double) percent / (double) 100.0f;
00095         }
00096 
00097         // ============================================
00098         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00099         // ============================================
00100         private void OnDeleteClicked (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00101             if (Delete != null) Delete(this);
00102         }
00103 
00104         private bool UpdateDownloadTime() {
00105             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00106                 progressBar.Text = "Elapsed Time: " + (DateTime.Now - startTime).ToString();
00107             });
00108             return(this.timeoutRet);
00109         }
00110 
00111         // ============================================
00112         // PROTECTED Methods
00113         // ============================================
00114 
00115         // ============================================
00116         // PRIVATE Methods
00117         // ============================================
00118         private void InitializeObject() {
00119             // Initialize Image Logo
00120             this.imageLogo = new Gtk.Image();
00121             this.imageLogo.Xpad = 5;
00122             this.PackStart(this.imageLogo, false, false, 2);
00123 
00124             // Initialize Delete Button
00125             this.deleteButton = new Gtk.Button(StockIcons.GetImage("DlTrash"));
00126             this.deleteButton.Relief = ReliefStyle.None;
00127             this.deleteButton.Clicked += new EventHandler(OnDeleteClicked);
00128             this.PackEnd(this.deleteButton, false, false, 2);
00129 
00130             // Initialize VBox
00131             this.vbox = new Gtk.VBox(false, 2);
00132             this.PackStart(this.vbox, true, true, 2);
00133 
00134             // Initialize Name
00135             this.labelName = new Gtk.Label();
00136             this.labelName.UseMarkup = true;
00137             this.labelName.Xalign = 0.0f;
00138             this.vbox.PackStart(this.labelName, false, false, 2);       
00139 
00140             // Initialize Status "6.1Mb of 10.1Mb (60%)"
00141             this.labelStatus = new Gtk.Label();
00142             this.labelStatus.UseMarkup = true;
00143             this.labelStatus.Xalign = 0.0f;
00144             this.vbox.PackStart(this.labelStatus, false, false, 2);     
00145 
00146             // Initialize ProgressBar
00147             this.progressBar = new Gtk.ProgressBar();
00148             this.vbox.PackStart(this.progressBar, false, false, 2);
00149 
00150             this.vbox.PackStart(new Gtk.HSeparator(), false, false, 2);
00151 
00152             this.ShowAll();
00153         }       
00154 
00155         // ============================================
00156         // PUBLIC Properties
00157         // ============================================
00158         public Gdk.Pixbuf Image {
00159             get { return(this.imageLogo.Pixbuf); }
00160             set { this.imageLogo.Pixbuf = value; }
00161         }
00162 
00163         public string FileName {
00164             get { return(this.labelName.Text); }
00165             set { this.labelName.Markup = value; }
00166         }
00167 
00168         public string Info {
00169             get { return(this.labelStatus.Text); }
00170             set { this.labelStatus.Markup = value; }
00171         }
00172 
00173         public Gtk.ProgressBar ProgressBar {
00174             get { return(this.progressBar); }
00175         }
00176 
00177         public bool Finished {
00178             get { return(this.finished); }
00179             set { 
00180                 this.finished = value; 
00181                 if (this.finished == true) 
00182                     timeoutRet = false;
00183             }
00184         }
00185     }
00186 }
